thi-ap30:3.1: 10 Yasodharāpamukhaaṭṭhārasabhikkhunīsahassaapadāna → aṭṭhārasabhikkhunīsahassāpadānaṃ (bj) | aṭṭhārasatherīsahassānamapadānaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed) | yasodharāpamukhāni aṭṭhārasabhikkhunī sahassāni apadānaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
thi-ap30:21.1: jānāmi → jānāma (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, csp1ed)
thi-ap30:25.4: cattāni jīvitāni no → sañcattaṃ jīvitampi no (sya1ed, sya2ed)
thi-ap30:63.4: Pappotha → pappotha (sya1ed, sya2ed) | santasaṃkhatadoso yo pappotha (pts-vp-pli1ed) | pajjotaṃ (mr)
thi-ap30:69.4: ca sattatimeva ca → aṭṭhasattatimeva ca (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
